item.title: Astrophotos
item.description: M101: Pinwheel Galaxy Figure 1: M101, The Pinwheel Galaxy

item.title: Some Theorems
item.description: Table of Contents Table of Contents The Yoneda Lemma The Tensor-Hom Adjunction Classification of commutative Frobenius algbebras Here are some of my favorite theorems. Click on the statements for some injected commentary. The Yoneda Lemma Let \( \mathsf{C} \) be a locally small category and \( F : \mathsf{C} \to \mathsf{Set} \) be a functor. Then \[ \operatorname*{Hom}(\operatorname*{Hom}(X,-),F) \cong FX \] and this isomorphism is natural in both \(X\) and \(F\).
